nodes.text: Hume was a Human male Officer who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

After the Galactic Empire was formed by Emperor Palpatine in 19 BBY, Hume was among the others that stood against the Empire and erased all records of himself until he joined the Erased. During a subsequent attack, Hume tried to rescue save a group of settlers until he was shot down by stormtroopers that attacked one of the Erased's bases.
